channel.title: Programming on jradhima
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on jradhima

item.title: Labels, not boxes
item.description: One of my favourite things about Python is how simple and approachable it is. Almost anyone can write some basic lines of code and it will probably run. Another thing I like is getting to understand the internals of the language. Once you move past the “I write short scripts that do X” phase, there is so much to discover and improve. The best part? Most of it is very easy and simple!
